phrases: Place your hand on my shoulder and speak.
Yo, do you hear me, Goku?
I am glad to hear you are all doing okay.
Yeah, but the gravity here has us beat.
Our bodies are so heavy, we can barely even run.
But I am heading for a place called Planet Namek, where they have Dragon Balls,
and I have started training under even more incredible gravity than that.
I have got to get a whole lot stronger in the next five and a half days,
or we are going to be in bad shape.
so Kuririn, Bulma and Gohan went to Planet Namek to search for the Dragon Balls.
But that Saiyan, Vegeta, had also gone to Planet Namek to find the Dragon Balls.
-So, did they get themselves done in by him?
No, it appears that Vegeta still are not discovered Kuririn and the others yet.
There is something even more unbelievable.
They said there are these other strange guys who are after the Dragon Balls.
The weird thing about them is that they were wearing
the exact same outfits Vegeta was.
What is more, they said that one of them has a Ki that is far greater than Vegeta's.
E- even greater than Vegeta, who was too much for even Goku to handle?
B- by any chance, was his name Freeza?
l do not know, I are not heard, but once I know, l'll tell you.
lf it is Freeza, then this is exceptionally bad...
G- Goku, I am going to check out Planet Namek for you.
Let us see, which direction is Planet Namek in?
Yamucha, tell us what is going on.
I am definitely sensing a tremendous Ki. Now to find the source of this Ki...
Goku, this foe is more than just too much for you, he is the worst of the worst.
There is no way you can handle this opponent.
W- what do you mean by that?
This is an order from Kaio.
When you get to Planet Namek,
take the other three aboard and get out of there immediately.
l'm not just saying this for your own sake.
I am saying this for the sake of everyone on Earth, Namek,
and many other planets as well.
If you launch some shoddy attack on Freeza and get him angry,
something terrible is going to happen.
You have to leave that guy alone.
Is he really that incredible a guy?
I would kind of like to have a look.
But still my spongy hind end!
Goku, whatever it takes, gather the Dragon Balls, and bring us back to life.
l'm going to build myself up even more than you did here, and go to Planet Namek.
The two of us will blow away this ridiculous whatever-his-name-is.
You guys do not know a thing about Freeza!
If you are planning to fight Freeza, I cannot teach you.
Promise me that you will not go to Planet Namek.
There is no way l'm going to keep a worthless promise like that.
l will not be able to surpass Goku by doing the same training that he did.
l'll have to pick up the points of the training,
and then hone the techniques on my own.
All right, how about we get started?
I will allow anyone who passes this test to train under me.
Even if he has told me not to mess with him, there is no harm in getting stronger!
All right, let us try jumping all the way to 50-times gravity!
Hey, if we keep flying at this pace,
how long before we arrive at the Grand Elder's place?
We should be able to make it in another five hours.
Damn, I cannot find anywhere that has multiple powers.
Are not there any more villages?
That is strange... one of them does not feel like a Namekian, or one of Freeza's men.
Maybe I should go check it out.
Sure enough, the ones who had trouble with this test were Tenshinhan and Piccolo.
And I can really make him laugh with that?
This one is definitely going to go over well!
His determination is different than the others up to now!
You think up your nose is secret, but it is (s)not!!
You think up your nose is secret, but it is (s)not!
You think up your nose is secret, but it is (s)not!!
l - l'm not sure I understand it, but in any case, it is funny, huh?
He is discovered us, all right!
He is coming straight toward us at incredible speed!
There is another large Ki out there!
This power is Zarbon, no doubt about it.
I have been waiting for him to move out on his own.
Damn... I finally made it to 30...
Now then, to begin your conditioning.
my conditioning is un- condition -ally severe.
You guys want to go home?
Okay, let us get started right away.
First of all, you are going to catch Bubbles- kun here.
It took even Son Goku three weeks to do it.
If we catch that monkey, will you train us, Kaio- sama?
After this, you have to train with Gregory.
You will train with me after all that is done.
Is this what you call training?
I do not remember giving you permission to participate in the training!
I do not wish to undertake any training under you if it undermines my own dignity.
Under -take any training under me... if it under -mines your dignity...
You made a triple, did you?
Hey, hey, hey, hey, what are you all standing around for?
If only I had a Scouter, a village would be easy to find.
Yo, it is been quite a long time, has not it, Zarbon- san?
You will find out once we go at it.
You will realize how strong I am.
Vegeta, why are you turning against Freeza- sama?
I have never liked that Freeza bastard.
Up until now, I have been pinned down by his power,
and had no choice but to do as he said,
but then I unexpectedly learned that I could gain eternal life.
You think I am about to let Freeza have them?
Once I have obtained eternal life, my chance to beat Freeza will come along for sure.
Do you think you can beat Freeza- sama with just eternal life?
It is too bad you do not have a Scouter.
I have gained more power than you could imagine over my many battles.
You are the one who does not understand.
Freeza- sama's ability far transcends even your level.
I am through with all of this pointless talk!
I heard from Dodoria that Freeza is afraid of Saiyans.
I am going to show you that Saiyan power, right now!
You really are full of yourself.
What Freeza- sama was afraid of was the Saiyans banding together.
You cannot do anything all by yourself.
Well, let us see about that.
It is a clash of Ki against Ki!
Vegeta and someone else are banging into each other!
H- his opponent is probably the one who was at that Freeza guy's side.
There is no way I can square off against them.
I hope the two of them end up flattening each other.
We will hurry to the Grand Elder while the two of them are fighting each other!
If I fly as fast as I can, we will get there a lot sooner!
Your movements make you look like you are standing still!
To think that you would be so helpless at this level!
You have indeed made magnificent progress.
you have awakened my true power, which has been dormant for many years.
Exactly what is this hidden, fearsome power of his?
